item.description:
UPDATE 7/8/11: The current roster is 10 men and 10 women. If you would like to be on the waitlist in case someone cancels, signup information is below (please include a phone number with your information).

This is a QK doubles event, which is a friendship tournament event meetup. The event will consist of reverse coed doubles matches played in a King-Queen format, meaning that you will be playing with and against different people during pool play. Top players after pool play will compete in a playoff format.

This is a friendship tournament format, meaning call your own faults, as there are no referees.

We will be using the ruleset listed in the first post on the following: http://www.meetup.com/volleyball-122/messages/boards/thread/8548572?thread=8548572

The events will start at 10:30 AM and will likely last at least until the mid afternoon (~3:30 PM). If you would like to play in this event you must commit to staying at least through the end of pool play. Remember to bring snacks/food and water/beverages, as this event will involve a significant amount of volleyball play.

This event is intended for players with experience playing reverse coed doubles format. Signup for these events is a little different. To sign up for one or more of these events, please send me an email using the following link on meetup: http://volleyball.meetup.com/122/message/?recipientId=4774008

In the email, provide the following information:

Name
Gender
Event date(s) that you would like to sign up for
Outdoor rating (AA/A/BB/B), if you have one; otherwise, short description of reverse coed doubles experience
Confirm that you have read the ruleset at the link above and that you agree to play by those rules.
Confirm that you can commit to play from 10:30 AM to 3:30 PM.
Signup partner name (if you have a signup partner)

Preferably, each player in a signup pair should send an email.

For this event we will have a nominal cap of 20 players (10 men, 10 women) to simplify the event management. Preference is given to AA/A/BB players who sign up in male/female pairs, although some single signups will be allowed. Note that sending an email does not guarantee a spot to play; spots are only guaranteed if you are assigned a Yes RSVP.
item.name: Advanced Outdoor (Grass) QK RevCoed Doubles Volleyball
